welcome.title: Build Your Booth - Exceptional Booth Building Experience
welcome.heroDescription: Elevate your booth-building experience with our digital platform and stay updated on upcoming exhibitions through our exhibition calendar.
welcome.heroFooter: Stay updated on the exhibition calendar for Saudi Arabia and Egypt.
welcome.servicesDescription: Designing an exceptional booth can be challenging, but we're here to help. Check out our solutions for building and designing your booth, complete with performance reports to measure its success.
welcome.boothDesignDesc: Our team handles everything from planning to setup, ensuring your booth attracts attention and engages your audience.
welcome.boothBuildDesc: We focus on your goals to build an attractive and effective display. With quality materials and additional features, we ensure your booth stands out.
welcome.performanceReportDesc: We analyze visitor numbers and engagement to help you improve future exhibitions. Boost your impact with our detailed report!
welcome.consultationDescription: Get your booth ready for your next event! Contact us now for a FREE consultation!
welcome.workingProcessDesc: From initial consultation to final delivery, we guide you through every step of creating an exceptional exhibition booth that stands out and engages your audience.
welcome.step1Desc: Submit your booth request with your exhibition details, location, and requirements. Tell us about your brand, target audience, and what you want to achieve at the event.
welcome.step2Desc: Our expert designers create a custom booth design tailored to your brand. We handle everything from concept to detailed planning, ensuring your booth attracts attention.
welcome.step3Desc: We build your booth using premium materials and cutting-edge technology. With our fast-track service, your booth is ready and delivered within 3 days of approval.
welcome.portfolioDescription: Discover a collection of our successful projects that showcase our creativity and expertise in booth building.

calendar.title: Events Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Stay Informed
calendar.description: Discover and explore upcoming events across Saudi Arabia and Egypt. Filter by industry, country, or keyword to find what matters to you.
calendar.searchPlaceholder: Search events by title, industry, tag...

about.title: About Us - Build Your Booth
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description: Our mission is to bridge the gap between exhibitors and their success by providing a centralized, easy-to-use platform for booth discovery and management.
about.welcomeHeading: We Are a Professional Exhibition Booths Builders
about.welcomeDescription: Build Your Booth specializes in creating exceptional exhibition experiences. With years of expertise in booth design and construction, we help businesses stand out at trade shows and exhibitions across Saudi Arabia and Egypt. Our team combines innovative design with quality craftsmanship to deliver booths that attract attention and engage your audience.
about.daysDeliveryDesc: Fast and efficient delivery service. We understand the importance of timing in exhibitions, which is why we ensure your booth is ready and delivered within 3 days of approval.
about.premiumMaterialsDesc: We use only the highest quality materials and cutting-edge technology to ensure your booth is durable, visually stunning, and built to last through multiple exhibitions.
about.whyChooseUsHeading: The Perfect Solution For All Exhibition Booth Building Services
about.whyChooseUsDescription: We provide comprehensive booth building services that cover every aspect of your exhibition needs. From initial design concepts to final installation, our experienced team ensures your booth reflects your brand and achieves your exhibition goals.
about.ourVisionDesc: To become the leading exhibition booth builder in the Middle East, recognized for innovation, quality, and exceptional customer service. We envision a future where every exhibitor has access to world-class booth solutions.
about.ourMissionDesc: To empower businesses with exceptional exhibition booths that drive engagement, increase brand visibility, and deliver measurable results. We commit to delivering excellence in every project, from concept to completion.
about.ctaTitle: Still Confused About Our Features? Get A Consultation
about.ctaDescription: Not sure which booth solution is right for you? Our expert team is here to help. Schedule a free consultation and discover how we can bring your exhibition vision to life.

contact.title: Contact Us - Build Your Booth
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a question or ready to build your next booth? We're here to help you stand out at your next exhibition.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.egyptAddress: 7 Taha Hussien st., New Nozha, Cairo
contact.responseTime: Our team typically responds within 2-4 hours during business days.

services.title: Our Services - Build Your Booth
services.subtitle: Excellence Defined
services.description: Comprehensive event management and discovery solutions designed to make your next exhibition a success.
services.eventDiscoveryDesc: Access a curated list of industry conferences, meetups, and workshops tailored to your interests and location.
services.calendarIntegrationDesc: Sync important event dates with your personal or team calendars effortlessly with our one-click export.
services.organizerAnalyticsDesc: Detailed reports and insights for event organizers to track attendance, engagement, and ROI.

footer.description: BuildYourBooth aims to assist exhibitors in building their booth in the best possible way!
footer.egyptLocation: 7 Taha Hussien st., New Nozha, Cairo
footer.scega: Saudi Conventions and Exhibitions General Authority
